Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.se2019.network.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RMIClient, SocketClient

    public abstract class Client
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements java.util.Observer

    Galli

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public abstract void connect()
                      throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                             java.rmi.RemoteException
        Connect client to server
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the IP of the socket server is not correct
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the IP of the RMI server is not correct

      • handleLoginMessage

        public void handleLoginMessage(boolean success,
                               boolean isFirst,
                               java.lang.String nickname)
        Forward the status of login at the UI.
        Parameters:
        success - True if login is successful, false otherwise
        isFirst - True if the user is the first of the match and must choose the map
        nickname - nickname of the user who has logged in

      • forwardToClientView

        public void forwardToClientView(ModelViewMessage message,
                                java.lang.String nickname)
        Forward the message to the client view object
        Parameters:
        message - The message to forward
        nickname - The player's nickname who has generate the message

      • handleEnemyMessage

        Parameters:

      • handleDisconnection

        public void handleDisconnection()
        Notify the View the user has been disconnected and close the client

      • handleStartGame

        public void handleStartGame(int matchID)
        Notify the View the game is started. This method is executed when all the views has been set correctly.
        Parameters:
        matchID - The match's ID which has started
